<h1 align="center">
  Mario Gilezan Portfolio
</h1>

This is my portfolio website built with [GatsbyJS](https://www.gatsbyjs.com/) on the frontend and [Sanity](https://www.sanity.io/) as content management system.

## 💻 Stacks & Tools:

- GatsbyJS
- GraphQL
- styled-components
- Framer
- Sanity
- Netlify
- VS Code
